Returns pet inventories by status(store;returns-pet-inventories-by-status) ------------------------------------------------------------------- [Test worker] INFO - * Given Jhon needs to manage his pet inventory [Test worker] INFO - * When requests to get his inventory [Test worker] INFO - * Jhon get inventory [Test worker] INFO - * Jhon executes a GET on the resource store/inventory [Test worker] INFO - * For Jhon: Then inventory approval should be 'true' [Test worker] INFO - * Then you will be informed of the current status of orders recived [Test worker] INFO - * For Jhon: The process was successful [Test worker] INFO - __ _____ _____ ____ _____ ____ _ ____ ____ _____ ____ _ \ \ |_ _| ____/ ___|_ _| | _ \ / \ / ___|/ ___|| ____| _ \ (_)_____| | | | | _| \___ \ | | | |_) / _ \ \___ \\___ \| _| | | | | _|_____| | | | | |___ ___) || | | __/ ___ \ ___) |___) | |___| |_| | (_) | | |_| |_____|____/ |_| |_| /_/ \_\____/|____/|_____|____/ /_/

view inventory impact(store;view-inventory-impact) ------------------------------------------------------------------- [Test worker] INFO - * Example: {petId=198772, quantity=7, status=approved, complete=true} [Test worker] INFO - * Given John needs to manage his pet inventory [Test worker] INFO - * When requests to get his inventory [Test worker] INFO - * John get inventory [Test worker] INFO - * John executes a GET on the resource store/inventory [Test worker] INFO - * For John: Then inventory approval should be 'true' [Test worker] INFO - * When request to create a an order | petId | quantity | status | complete | | 198772 | 7 | approved | true | [Test worker] INFO - * John create order [Test worker] INFO - * John executes a POST on the resource store/order [Test worker] INFO - * Then the number of approved must be greater than those who were initially consulted [Test worker] INFO - * John get inventory [Test worker] INFO - * John executes a GET on the resource store/inventory [Test worker] INFO - * For John: The process was successful [Test worker] INFO - * For John: Then inventory modificated should be 'true' [Test worker] INFO - __ _____ _____ ____ _____ ____ _ ____ ____ _____ ____ _ \ \ |_ _| ____/ ___|_ _| | _ \ / \ / ___|/ ___|| ____| _ \ (_)_____| | | | | _| \___ \ | | | |_) / _ \ \___ \\___ \| _| | | | | _|_____| | | | | |___ ___) || | | __/ ___ \ ___) |___) | |___| |_| | (_) | | |_| |_____|____/ |_| |_| /_/ \_\____/|____/|_____|____/ /_/
